table_description: Retrieve information about your current account.

columns.name: email
columns.description: The email address used by the current user to register for DigitalOcean.

columns.name: droplet_limit
columns.description: The total number of Droplets the current user or team may have at one time.

columns.name: email_verified
columns.description: If true, the user has verified their account via email. False otherwise.

columns.name: floating_ip_limit
columns.description: The total number of floating IPs the current user or team may have.

columns.name: status
columns.description: This value is one of \"active\", \"warning\" or \"locked\".

columns.name: status_message
columns.description: A human-readable message giving more details about the status of the account.

columns.name: uuid
columns.description: The unique universal identifier for the current user.

columns.name: volume_limit
columns.description: The total number of volumes the current user or team may have.
